title: Bulk Email Sender
description: Send personalized bulk emails with your connected Gmail account.
detailedDescription: Compose and send bulk email campaigns from one place. Connect Gmail with OAuth, create contact groups, import recipients from Excel, personalize subject/body content, and attach files. Your SMTP configuration is stored per account and used to send through your own Gmail connection.

title: Data files Converter
description: Convert between Excel (.xlsx), CSV, and JSON files directly in your browser.
detailedDescription: Upload an Excel, CSV, or JSON file and convert it to either of the other two formats. All parsing and conversion happen client-side, so your files stay on your device.

title: Text to QR Builder
description: Generate QR codes from text or URLs, with optional logo support.
detailedDescription: Create scannable QR codes from plain text or links with live preview. Optionally add a logo and short label, then download the final image as PNG. Processing is done in-browser, so no input is uploaded.

title: Image Compressor
description: Compress images locally with instant selected-image preview.
detailedDescription: Reduce image file size directly in your browser with no uploads. Preview selected images immediately, tune compression quality, then compress and download files individually or as a ZIP archive. Ideal for fast web optimization while keeping images private.

title: Image Format Converter
description: Convert PNG, JPG, WEBP, and BMP images fully in your browser.
detailedDescription: Convert a single image between PNG, JPG, WEBP, and BMP formats in your browser. Pick source and target formats, then export instantly with no uploads or backend processing.

title: Image / PDF Merger
description: Merge images and PDFs into one PDF, fully offline-capable.
detailedDescription: Combine multiple images and PDF documents into a single PDF file. Reorder items, rotate images, choose page size and margins, set fit behavior, and optionally add page numbers. Built with client-side processing for privacy and speed.

title: PDF Splitter
description: Extract page ranges or split a PDF into multiple files.
detailedDescription: Upload a PDF and split it locally in your browser. Extract selected pages into a single PDF, or generate one PDF per page as a ZIP download. All processing runs on-device for privacy and offline use.

title: Image Crop Tool
description: Crop images locally with live preview and export options.
detailedDescription: Select a crop area with pixel-level controls, preview the selected region, and export as PNG, JPEG, or WebP. Everything runs entirely in your browser, so images never leave your device.

title: Invoice / Receipt Generator
description: Create professional invoices and receipts directly in your browser.
detailedDescription: Build polished invoices or receipts with seller/buyer details, line items, taxes, shipping, discounts, and notes. Totals are calculated automatically, and the final document can be exported as PDF. Data stays local and can be reused in your browser.

title: Text Difference Checker
description: Compare two text versions and highlight what changed.
detailedDescription: Paste two versions of text and view line-by-line differences, including additions, removals, and modified blocks. Useful for reviewing edits in content, configs, or code snippets. Everything runs locally in your browser.

title: JSON Formatter + Validator
description: Validate, format, and minify JSON instantly.
detailedDescription: Paste JSON and run quick validation with readable error feedback. Format with indentation for readability or minify for compact payloads. This utility is fully client-side, making it fast and privacy-friendly for developer workflows.

title: Spring Boot Log Analyzer
description: Parse Spring Boot logs and detect likely root-cause errors.
detailedDescription: Upload or paste Spring Boot logs to identify likely first-failure events, exception chains, stack-frame locations, and correlation-id clusters. Export a structured JSON incident report for sharing and follow-up debugging.

title: Cron Builder + Validator
description: Build, validate, and preview 5-field and 6-field cron schedules.
detailedDescription: Create cron expressions with direct input, validate syntax instantly, and preview upcoming execution times. Supports both 5-field (minute hour day-of-month month day-of-week) and 6-field (second minute hour day-of-month month day-of-week) formats, with human-readable interpretation to reduce scheduling mistakes.

title: JWT Encoder / Decoder
description: Decode JWTs and generate signed HS256/HS512 tokens.
detailedDescription: Inspect JWT header and payload, edit claims, and generate new tokens using HS256 or HS512 algorithms. Helpful for API testing and debugging authentication flows. Operations are performed in-browser without sending token data to a backend.

title: UUID Generator
description: Generate UUID v4 values quickly in bulk.
detailedDescription: Create one or many UUID v4 identifiers with options like uppercase output or hyphen removal. Copy all generated values at once for use in development, testing, and data workflows.

title: String Encryptor / Decryptor
description: Encrypt and decrypt text with a secret key using AES, including Jasypt-style workflows.
detailedDescription: Encrypt plain text into ciphertext and decrypt ciphertext back into readable text using a secret key with AES (crypto-js). Includes a server mode with PBKDF2-HMAC-SHA512 + AES-256 for Jasypt-style workflows and interoperability scenarios.

title: Torensa API Forge
description: Forge and test API requests directly in the browser.
detailedDescription: Torensa API Forge lets you send API requests directly in the browser, including JWT Bearer auth, custom headers, query/path parameters, and JSON/raw body.
